column1: There are 3 different kind of items: weapon
Items can be picked up but it cost an action. Your own items can be seen if you click on the arrow at the right corner and a list pops out. You can hold unlimited items
column2: but only equip one armor and one weapon and you equip an item by clicking at the item and then press equip.

column1: Weapons is used to kill monsters and have damage stats
column2: it stats can vary for each weapon.

column1: Armors is used for projection against attacks and other sorts of damage.
